title: Appointment Scheduling System
summary: Build a comprehensive appointment scheduling system for patients and healthcare providers.
description:
This epic covers the development of a full-featured appointment scheduling system that allows:
- Patients to book appointments online
- Healthcare providers to manage their schedules
- Automated reminders and notifications
- Calendar integration
- Rescheduling and cancellation workflows

## Goals
- Reduce no-show rates through automated reminders
- Improve patient experience with easy booking
- Optimize provider schedules
- Support multiple appointment types

## Constraints
- Must handle timezone conversions
- Should support recurring appointments
- Must integrate with patient management system
